attributes.action: Discourage imports of products with high carbon footprints
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We express the view that imports into the EU of goods which have been produced with disregard for climate change and have had a worse effect on the environment than would have been allowed in Europe should be discouraged.  This could be done through a range of measures, such as quotas, tariffs or bans, but the EU should act with Britain leading the call to do so.
